nodes.text: Toleen Bisma was a Rodian male who worked as a crime lord during the time of the Galactic Empire.

Bisma kept the Twi'lek Sha'lia as a slave, although she eventually escaped from him, with the help of Trandoshan Goort. In 7 ABY, Bisma featured in a vision that Sha'lia experienced in the Temple of Pain, in the Tascollan Nebula.
